Class EnergyBars

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • EnergyBars
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class EnergyBars
extends java.awt.Canvas
    This class extends the Canvas class implementing all drawing operations to display the agent energy bars on the right side of the main frame.
    Author:
    Peter Eredics
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
